long tail for sewing arms and legs make 2 of each round 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in beg st to make ring chain 1 and work 6 single_crochet in ring 6 sts do not join or turn but cont to work into previous round here and throughout round 2 work 2 single_crochet in first st 1 single_crochet in next st 6 times 9 sts work even in single_crochet for 6 more rnds end round with slip_stitch and fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing muzzle round 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in beg st to make ring chain 1 and work 6 single_crochet in ring 6 sts do not join or turn but cont to work into previous round here and throughout round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each st 12 sts work even in single_crochet for 1 more round end with slip_stitch and fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing ears make 2 round 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in beg st to make ring chain 1 and work 6 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch 6 sts round 2 chain 1 and turn work 2 single_crochet in the next st 4 times leaving remaining sts unworked 8 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing we re waving to you from our window--i see you walking by construction and finishing refer to pictures of finished bears and to diagram below for body finish stuffing the body and whipstitch bottom edge forming a flat seam for face add small bit of stuffing to muzzle using a yarn needle whipstitch muzzle to lower part of face using embroidery floss or yarn and needle embroider an x shape in the middle of the muzzle and fill in the top part of the x with satin stitch or long stitches using sewing thread sew on buttons for eyes
